line.originaltext: 1 1/2 cups quick-cooking oats
3/4 cup all-purpose flour
1/4 teaspoon baking soda
3/4 cup packed brown sugar
1/2 cup shortening
In a medium bowl, stir together the oats, flour, baking soda and brown sugar.
